mapper.update: update notice_board set n_password=#{n_password}, n_secret_chk=#{n_secret_chk}, n_title=#{n_title}, n_content=#{n_content}, n_regdate=#{n_regdate} where n_board_no=#{n_board_no}
mapper.select: select n.* ,m.* from notice_board n join member_Info m on n.mem_no=m.mem_no order by n_board_no desc
select * from notice_board where n_board_no = (select n_board_no from notice_board where n_board_no < #{n_board_no} order by n_board_no desc limit 1)
select * from notice_board where n_board_no = (select n_board_no from notice_board where n_board_no > #{n_board_no} order by n_board_no limit 1)
